sub_title: Delegated Representative Water Affairs at the Embassy of the Kingdom of the Netherlands in Bangladesh
summary:
After finishing my BSc degree International Land and Water Management I graduated in 1995 from the Wageningen Agricultural University from the department of Irrigation and obtained a Master of Agriculture, Natural Environment and Soil & Water Conservation.

The main thread through the variety of positions that I held since graduation is my facination and passion for complex problems in the field of water management and climate change in their sociatal context.

Since 2007 I work for the Ministry of Infrastructure and Environment, Rijkswaterstaat, the Netherlands. I started as senior advisor water management. Since March 2022 I hold the position of strategic adviror climate change. I am responsible for the strategic planning of activities in this field, advice the policy department of the Ministry and senior level management at Rijkswaterstaat. Previous roles were: project manager for the policy project on future water supply in the Netherlands, knowledge manager Delta sub-programme on Fresh Water Supply and senior advisor the interdepartmental and intergovernmental programme team governing the Delta sub-programme.

Previous positions were held in Pakistan  – researcher at the International Waterlogging and Salinity Research Institute (1996-1999); Rome – technical officer at the Food and Agriculture Organisation of the United Nations (1999-2002); UK – researcher at HR Wallingford (2002-2003) and hydrologist at the Environment Agency (2004-2007).

Added value is my great knowledge on water management in a changing world. My analytical and advisory skills, together with my programme leaders’ qualities within political sensitive environments. I am sensitive for the needs of teams and the individuals within. Under my leadership teams achieve great results that are satisfactory to - and in line with the wishes and demand of the employer.

Specialties: I am an excellent water management and climate change specialist that connects these subjects to socio-economic changes, broader societal transitions, and decision-making under deep-uncertainty. I am and experienced advisor in political and policy sensitive environments. I show leadership in complex programme settings. I am an excellent programme manager within difficult institutional settings. I am a highly analytical person that enjoys bringing structure in chaotic processes and material. I have good communication skills, the ability to work in multi-disciplinary, -institutional and -cultural settings.

company.name: Embassy of the Kingdom of the Netherlands in Bangladesh

profile_positions.company: Embassy of the Kingdom of the Netherlands in Bangladesh
profile_positions.description: Seconded by the Netherlands Enterprise Agency, Ministry of Economic Affairs and Climate my main resposibility lies in supporting the Government of Bangaldesh in their endeavour to implement the Bangladesh Delta Program 2100. I facilitate the cooperation between the Netherlands and Bangladesh in the field of water and adaptive delta management.  Now that Bangladesh is predicted to become a middle income country the cooperation between the Netherlands and Bangladesh will be transformed in an equal and balanced  one based on working together within the 'golden-triangle' of government, knowledge institutes and private sector. I will establish relations and networks to facilitate this cooperation.
profile_positions.title: Delegated Representative Water

profile_positions.description: In the coming decades the Netheralnds faces multiple societal challanges e.g. energy transition, housing issues, water quality and ecological restoration. At the same time we need to become more climate resilient. The Dutch government works on climate adaptation by putting the soil and water system as organizing principle in spatial planning. Rijkswaterstaat plays a pivotal role in this transition through their knowledge of the soil- and watersystem and combing this with the work on the national infrastructure. In my role as strategic advisor I am initiating work on climate adaptation throughout the Rijkswaterstaat organisation and play an import role as advsor to the Minitry of Water and Infrastructure. Through my endeavours Rijkswaterstaat should be enabled to incorporate climate adpatation in all work throughtout the asset management cycle.
profile_positions.title: Strategic Advisor Climate Adaptation

profile_positions.description: In the function of senior advisor/specialist water management I am the focal point for the Ministry of Infrastructure and the Environment and Rijkswaterstaat on fresh-saline water issues. I am responsible for the strategic planning of activities in the field of saline-fresh water use and management of the interface including: development of decision making frameworks, identifying required knowledge and planning of knowledge development activities, advising the policy department and senior management at Rijkswaterstaat on strategic and investment plans and provide technical support to various projects. Further I advise the interdepartmental and intergovernmental programme team governing the Delta sub-programme on appropriate implementation and delivery strategies, methodological matters, required policy development and the research agenda.
profile_positions.title: senior advisor Water

profile_positions.description: In the function of senior advisor/expert on water management my main tasks included: project management of a large research project on future water supply in the Netherlands for the Directorate General Water (DGW) of the Ministry of Infrastructure and Environment; knowledge management for the Delta sub-programme on Fresh Water Supply in the Netherlands; and advise and support the interdepartmental and intergovernmental programme team governing the Delta sub-programme with appropriate implementation and delivery strategies. The research project on future water supply in the Netherlands was a five year programme which delivered the knowledge base for the Delta sub-programme, on the basis of which in 2014 a policy decision was taken on the fresh water strategy for the next 35 years.
profile_positions.title: senior advisor Water

profile_positions.location: Environment Agency, UK; FAO, Italy; IWASRI, Pakistan; and various consultancies
profile_positions.description: For previous position see uploaded CV
profile_positions.title: Various positions held
